message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor.  Consider the depreciation - it hurts you more than me to wait.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need more than 30%.  Let's split it 65/35, which still gives you a good portion and allows us to end this before we both lose too much to inflation.
